title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press Add for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

b. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

c. Need a width hint for the dialog.

d. Why does the File Editors Preference page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, d.

Need to release

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, d, g.
OB: When adding associated editors, only single-selection is possible.
EB: Multiple selection should be enabled when adding associated editors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Open the preference page and navigate to Workbench > File Editors.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' list, switch to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' (no selection should be made).
4. Press OK.

Expected result: The selected external editor should be added to the 'Internal Editors' list without clearing the existing selection.
